entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:55 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 03:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.

entry.title: Saturday: Showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon.
